parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular

str2: An apparently primary word; a measure, literally or figuratively; by implication, a limited portion.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To measure (out), estimate. From metron; to measure; by implication, to admeasure.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To measure (out), estimate. From metron; to measure; by implication, to admeasure.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To place (put) to, add; I do again. From pros and tithemi; to place additionally, i.e. Lay beside, annex, repeat.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
